attributes.action: make all cyclist pay road tax and have full insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make all cyclist pay road tax and fully comprehensive insurance.
If they have none of the above then confiscate and crush their cycles.
They are a nussance on the road and a danger to other road users. If they connot abide by the rules of the road then they should be prosecuted as any other road user is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
